summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2008 DODGE SPRINTER 3500. THE CONTACT RECEIVED NOTIFICATION OF NHTSA CAMPAIGN NUMBERS: 15V354000 (AIR BAGS) AND 16V077000 (AIR BAGS) HOWEVER, THE PARTS TO DO THE REPAIRS WERE UNAVAILABLE. THE CONTACT STATED THAT THE MANUFACTURER EXCEEDED A REASONABLE AMOUNT OF TIME FOR THE RECALL REPAIRS. THE DEALER RAINBOW CHRYSLER DODGE JEEP LLC LOCATED AT 301 RIVER HIGHLANDS BLVD, COVINGTON, LA 70433; (985) 892-9165 WAS CONTACTED AND STATED THAT THEY 'DO NOT HAVE ANY TECHNICIANS WHO KNOW HOW TO WORK ON THE VEHICLE.' THE MANUFACTURER WAS CONTACTED AT 800-853-1403. THE MANUFACTURER ALSO STATED THAT THEY WERE UNABLE TO ASSIST. THE MANUFACTURER WAS MADE AWARE OF THE ISSUE. THE CONTACT HAD NOT EXPERIENCED A FAILURE. PARTS DISTRIBUTION DISCONNECT.
